Html:
The mainland China armory is available by late June, 2008, thus characters on CN server could be accessed by Rawr.
The armory site of CN server is: http://cn.wowarmory.com and this site is available in English.
Would you please add CN server support to Rawr? thx
Hey. Can you build and try the latest development build? I've added CN support, but the CN Armory seems to be down. Can you test it?

As of 2:55pm Aug 17 (CST +0800) the CN armory is down at the moment.
I'll test it later. thx
